title: RHOC: Seeing Red
description:
Major news on "Real Housewives of Orange County": Emily showed emotion! The lawyer/party planner lost her mind when Kelly Dodd complained about Shane right to her face. And it was glorious.

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
